com.github.mikephil.charting.charts

Class PieRadarChartBase<T extends ChartData<? extends IDataSet<? extends Entry>>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewGroup
      • com.github.mikephil.charting.charts.Chart<T>
        • com.github.mikephil.charting.charts.PieRadarChartBase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChartInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PieChart, RadarChart

    public abstract class PieRadarChartBase<T extends ChartData<? extends IDataSet<? extends Entry>>>
extends Chart<T>
    Baseclass of PieChart and RadarChart.

      • notifyDataSetChanged

        public void notifyDataSetChanged()
        Description copied from class: Chart
        Lets the chart know its underlying data has changed and performs all necessary recalculations. It is crucial that this method is called everytime data is changed dynamically. Not calling this method can lead to crashes or unexpected behaviour.
        Specified by:
        notifyDataSetChanged in class Chart<T extends ChartData<? extends IDataSet<? extends Entry>>>

      • getAngleForPoint

        public float getAngleForPoint(float x,
                     float y)
        returns the angle relative to the chart center for the given point on the chart in degrees. The angle is always between 0 and 360°, 0° is NORTH, 90° is EAST, ...
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        Returns:

      • getPosition

        public MPPointF getPosition(MPPointF center,
                   float dist,
                   float angle)
        Returns a recyclable MPPointF instance. Calculates the position around a center point, depending on the distance from the center, and the angle of the position around the center.
        Parameters:
        center -
        dist -
        angle - in degrees, converted to radians internally
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • setRotationAngle

        public void setRotationAngle(float angle)
        Set an offset for the rotation of the RadarChart in degrees. Default 270f --> top (NORTH)
        Parameters:
        angle -

      • getRawRotationAngle

        public float getRawRotationAngle()
        gets the raw version of the current rotation angle of the pie chart the returned value could be any value, negative or positive, outside of the 360 degrees. this is used when working with rotation direction, mainly by gestures and animations.
        Returns:

      • getRotationAngle

        public float getRotationAngle()
        gets a normalized version of the current rotation angle of the pie chart, which will always be between 0.0 < 360.0
        Returns:

      • setRotationEnabled

        public void setRotationEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set this to true to enable the rotation / spinning of the chart by touch. Set it to false to disable it. Default: true
        Parameters:
        enabled -
